system.notes: Reroll (1). If damage roll exceeds armour, does 3d10 Crew and 2d10 Morale damage instead of hull damage. Repeats each turn until -10 Command Test passed. Same occurs to you if torpedo tube holding this is damaged. Refer to Torpedo Rules block.

description.value:
Damage: 2d10+10

Notes: Reroll (1). If damage roll exceeds armour, does 3d10 Crew and 2d10 Morale damage instead of hull damage. Repeats each turn until -10 Command Test passed. Same occurs to you if torpedo tube holding this is damaged. Refer to Torpedo Rules block.
